name: Space at Bali

reviews.text: We have stayed at many hotels around the world but Space was a special place to be. It is true luxury. Not pretentious like most big chains but gives you a seance of elegance yet casual and very comfortable. The villas are well appointed and the service is amazing. The pool in the two bed room villa where we were staying, is great as you can do lengths and exercise as well as chill out. I spent time at the gazebo reading and listening to music which is connected through the main system. The kitchen comes in handy when you dont feel like going out and just want to make a salad etc for lunch.The staff is amazing and the villas supervisors are very helpful. You like coconut...we will get it for you, cut it, pour out the water and make you feel special. The highlight was the massage we took every morning, in the villa. I had mine in the gazebo which was amazing. The therapist are well trained and professional. We stayed five nights but could easily do another few. The location is great as its not to far from the restraunt's and Main Street of semanyak. Stay for a week, get a massage every day, swim, read, chill and you will not know how e days went by.
reviews.title: Space is true luxury

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This came highly recommended and did not disappoint. Seminyak can be hot and overbearing during the day at times. Having your own villa and pool in a secure compound of villas close to the town is a must, for some of us. We stayed June 1-5 and spent a lot of time at our villa: midnight swims, reading, snoozing before heading off the the town's top bars and restaurants in the evening. We had to check at noon but did not fly from Bali until midnight. We could not get a late check out but the manager invited us to come back to the offices at 9 pm for a shower before the flight. Heaven. Very good people.
reviews.title: Oasis in Seminyak

reviews.text: The entire experience was fantastic for our first family trip to Bali. We had 3 kids in tow, years 5,3 and 4 months.
reviews.title: A Perfect Family Holiday

reviews.text: The 2 bedroom villa was huge, beautiful and the size of the private pool was an envy to many of our friends.
reviews.title: Beautiful Villa

reviews.text: The staff went out of their way to ensure all our needs were met. Even a request to child proof the swimming pool was done as soon as possible. No task was too difficult be it getting transport, a late night request for medicine etc.
reviews.title: Loved Space
Watch this space
reviews.text: We loved our 5 night stay at space. The location is good and it is generally very quiet. The best thing about our villa was the pool - massive and very clean. Bed was comfy and air con very good. The butler service is great, breakfast cooked for you each morning in your villa, with a few different choices. A couple of small things that would have made the stay even better, the umbrella isn't big enough to provide shade for both the day beds a bigger one would be good, a pillow menu would have been good as we found them too soft, and the coffee wasn't that great. Only minor things but also easy to fix! We would stay here again without doubt.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had the most wonderful stay here for 5 nights. What we valued most about this villa was the serenity, privacy and space off course. Diligent, friendly staff with our own butler. Fantastic location, short walk or ride to everything. Perfect couples retreat, romantic get away.
reviews.title: Private paradise

reviews.text: Space Villas are lovely. We stayed in a 2 bedroom villa with friends and had a great time. The pool is amazing and there is so much 'space' at Space! Location was good with only a 5 minute walk to one of the main streets in Seminyak with restaurants, shops and markets. If feeling energetic then an hours walk to Kuta - or just a few dollars in a taxi.
reviews.title: Nice place

reviews.text: My first visit to Bali was made perfect with the excellent hospitality we received at Space. We were definitely spoiled by our butler whose response to our every request was "certainly." and our enormous private pool.
reviews.title: Certainly the epitome of Balinese hospitality

reviews.text: We really had no reason to leave our villa and see no reason not to come back.
reviews.title: Luxurious villas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I really love this place. The villa was gorgeous: big comfortable bed, spacious rooms, nice bathroom. The outdoor area was great too. Pool was nice, day bed, etc. Wifi connection worked very well.
reviews.title: Perfect!

reviews.text: The service was excellent. Our butler and all staffs were really warm and friendly. Breakfast was prepared directly at the villa every morning with more than enough variety to choose in advance. Since it was my birthday during the stay, they brought us a special cake and a bottle of champagne. It is a pity I did not have a chance to try the private BBQ.
reviews.title: Beautiful accomodation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very very nice villas, laid out with careful thought.
reviews.title: we loved it

reviews.text: Great privacy and great location. Just enough out the center to be quiet but close enough to get to all the great hotspots quickly.
reviews.title: Spacious tranquil villa with excellent service

reviews.text: Have already booked to stay again!
reviews.title: Wonderful Space!
Our special space in Bali
reviews.text: No one can realy explain how wonderfull a place is in a review but we read all of them before deciding to book a villa at Space at Bali. If you find anything wrong in this place your biggest worry in life is probably....what type of bottled water to get? This place is wonderfull amazing and the friendliest people on the planet. Yes you get your own butler that will look after you and spoil you. Widana was our villa butler and he is amazing. We could just think out loud and he will make it happen! Anything! Nothing is a problem, excellent service is the only standard. He would make breakfast, arrange scooters, laundry, advice where to get what and even teach me a few basic words in Balinese. Thank you for a very special holiday that will be remembered always and to Widana: "Terima kasih"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed in 1 bedroom villa for 1 night. The villa is spacious, separate toilet, shower box & bathtub. The swimming pool clean & big.. The services VERY2 FANTASTIC. You have your own personal butler.. You can ask him to by some food from outside or ask them to buy something in the minimarket. Breakfast was cooked by the butler at your villa's kitchen & then served at your villa's living room.. I felt like KING & QUEEN while staying here.. I definitely will stay here again if i'm going to bali in the future..
reviews.title: Excellent & Spacious Villa.. Service was 11 from 10 !!!!

reviews.text: A friend and I stayed in a 2 bedroom villa at Space at Bali for a week. We were pretty blown away by the beautiful private garden, the big pool, the friendly, helpful staff and big, comfy beds. We really felt that we had landed in the lap of luxury. It was lovely to come home from a hot day of shopping or sightseeing and sip a cocktail in the pool while listening to music. By the end of the week we were completely relaxed, which was exactly what we were looking for.
reviews.title: Space is the word

reviews.text: We took a package for a week, which included a BBQ cooked for us in the villa one night, a massage and a day trip - all of which were terrific.The staff couldn't have been nicer - the reception staff, Suar our butler, Gede the driver, and Mudana the chef and cocktail maker extraordinaire were friendly, professional and helpful.
reviews.title: A perfect place to stay as a couple on honeymoon or a family or a group of friends. The villas are spacious, clean, comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Both of us agreed that we would be coming back to stay one day and would have no hesitation in recommending the villa to our friends.
reviews.title: Amazing!

description: Hidden just behind the exciting Seminyak beach, restaurant and shopping district is an exclusive villa property that introduces a new level of holiday vacationing. Be one of the first to experience this boutique complex of total 11 (6 two-bedroom and 5 one-bedroom) spacious private pool villas all with interconnecting Balinese carved wooden doors.Great attention to detail has been given to ensure Space at Bali Villas will captivate guests imagination and create a tropical ambience which combined with the Moroccan flair will surely be a villa holiday that will be long remembered.With soaring roof lines and clean symmetrical lines with an exterior colour combination of warm desert sand, Space Villas stands out from other villas. Every effort has been made to ensure our guests relaxation with modern comforts and conveniences.Space at Bali is positioned at either side of the main living quarters to overlook the pool and garden. Air-conditioned for nights of restful slumber, both bedrooms feature tasteful furnishings built in flat screen TV and Entertainment systems with designer lighting to create that perfect mood. FREE Wireless internet is available.A walk through wardrobe space with plenty of area to unpack and spread out during your holiday is situated between the bedroom and bathroom. Enjoy double vanity units and a spacious bath tub all set in a lovely indoor / outdoor landscaped area. With a large shower featuring a raindrop shower head and lots of soft large towels ensure your bathing time at Space Villas will be another pleasure to be savoured.For guests needing more bedrooms Space Villas are able to open up the 1 or 2 bedroom villa which easily converts into a connecting 2 or 4 bedroom villa via the Balinese doors found at the end of the pool. Groups of friends or families can still enjoy privacy but have the added advantage of being connected with their traveling party. With ample outdoor space for social gatherings, pre-dinner drinks or dining by the pool, we offer many options to our guests. Space Villas has been designed as a modern retreat to replenish the body and spirit from the effects of a hectic lifestyle.
